messages.subject: OT: Hello
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone I m sorry I haven t been active lately it s just since last tuesday in October I ve been sick with a bad cold. I ve been coughing, which makes my
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone I'm sorry I haven't been active lately it's just since
last tuesday in October I've been sick with a bad cold. I've been
coughing, which makes my head hurt when I cough, sneezing, sniffling
and had to deal with a sore throat. Also at the same time last
tuesday when I got this cold, which I still have, I got my monthly
inconveinience so I was really bad off so wish me a speedy recovery
so I can get back to chatting with everyone!
